pkgmetadata.longdescription: Knossos=======A modern mod manager and launcher for FreeSpace Open.After installing this package, you can launch Knossos with ``knossos`` or ``python -m knossos``.Website: https://dev.tproxy.de/knossos/Source Code: https://github.com/ngld/knossosDiscussion on HLP: http://www.hard-light.net/forums/index.php?topic=86364.new#lastPost
